File libsrc/libmath/deltaz.c

Public Functions

deltaz 
 void deltaz(double slat,
             double slon,
             double rlat,
             double rlon,
             double *delta,
             double *az,
             double *baz)
Compute source-receiver distance, azimuth and back-azimuth.

Parameters:
slat - Source latitude in degrees.
slon - Source longitude in degrees.
rlat - Receiver latitude in degrees.
rlon - Receiver longitude in degrees.
delta - Returned distance from source to receiver in degrees.
az - Returned azimuth from source to receiver in degrees.
baz - Returned azimuth from receiver to source in degrees.
